name: Princess & Phantom
description:
Hime had always been a sheltered princess, forbidden to leave the royal palace, until an escapade gone wrong turned her into a magical girl. With her newfound invisibility powers, she enjoys a life outside the palace, but not for long...

A short visual novel featuring about 3,400~ words and 4 different endings.

Made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #7.

Controls:

  • Left click, space, or enter to advance text.
  • Left click on choices to select them, or use arrow keys/enter
  • Hold Ctrl to skip dialogue, or press Tab to toggle skipping
  • Right click/Esc to access the menu, where you can save or load
  • Shift+A for accessibility options
